description: In pursuit of the implementation of the Disaster Management Medium Term Framework of Action, the UN system will engage in strengthening disaster response preparedness.

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to fulfill key functions of government for recovery in early post-crisis situations
subproject.description: National Disaster Centre (NDC) and Provincial Government has the capacity to prepare for and respond to natural disasters
subproject.title: Government Disaster Capacity
